name: Cosmic Nomad Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Increase the stats of all allies in battle by +100%
All of your attacks land as Perfect Attacks and you are Immune to all Silence and Ability Disabling effects
Grant 1 Power and a 25% chance for an Extra Turn to each ally every action
This Talisman's effects only activate when equipped to a 5★ The Nomad character.
